title: MAGIX Music Maker 2013 Premium 19.05.57 + Soundpool DVD Collecti
description:
I was frustrated because not all the Soundpool DVD Collections were easily accessible. So I downloaded them all from various sites and combined them into one .rar file. I also added one of the most recent cracked versions of MAGIX Music Maker. I did not Crack the program myself or rip any of the DVD Collections, I just put it all together. 



Credit for MAGIX Music Maker goes to Ching_Liu
